verses.verse: ([A Psalm] of David.) To Thee, O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> I <S%H5375>lift<s%> up my <S%H5315>soul.<s%>
O my <S%H430>God,<s%> in Thee I <S%H982>trust,<s%> Do not let me be <S%H954>ashamed;<s%> Do not let my <S%H340>enemies<s%> <S%H5970>exult<s%> over me.

<S%H1571>Indeed,<s%> <S%H3605>none<s%> <S%H3808><s%> of those who <S%H6960>wait<s%> for Thee will be <S%H954>ashamed;<s%> Those who <S%H898>deal<s%> <S%H898>treacherously<s%> <S%H7387>without<s%> <S%H7387>cause<s%> will be <S%H954>ashamed.<s%>
Make me <S%H3045>know<s%> Thy <S%H1870>ways,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> <S%H3925>Teach<s%> me Thy <S%H734>paths.<s%>

<S%H1869>Lead<s%> me in Thy <S%H571>truth<s%> and <S%H3925>teach<s%> me, For Thou art the <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H3468>salvation;<s%> For Thee I <S%H6960>wait<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>day.<s%>
<S%H2142>Remember,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> Thy <S%H7356>compassion<s%> and Thy <S%H2617>lovingkindnesses,<s%> For they have been from of <S%H5769>old.<s%>

Do not <S%H2142>remember<s%> the <S%H9128>sins<s%> of my <S%H5271>youth<s%> or my <S%H6588>transgressions;<s%> According to Thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> <S%H2142>remember<s%> Thou me, For Thy goodness' <S%H4616>sake,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
<S%H2896>Good<s%> and <S%H3477>upright<s%> is the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> <S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> He <S%H3384>instructs<s%> <S%H2400>sinners<s%> in the <S%H1870>way.<s%>
He <S%H1869>leads<s%> the <S%H6035>humble<s%> in <S%H4941>justice,<s%> And He <S%H3925>teaches<s%> the <S%H6035>humble<s%> His <S%H1870>way.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H734>paths<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> are <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> and <S%H571>truth<s%> To those who <S%H5341>keep<s%> His <S%H1285>covenant<s%> and His <S%H9381>testimonies.<s%>
For Thy name's <S%H4616>sake,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H5545>Pardon<s%> my <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> for it is <S%H7227>great.<s%>
<S%H4310>Who<s%> is the <S%H376>man<s%> who <S%H3372>fears<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>? He will <S%H3384>instruct<s%> him in the <S%H1870>way<s%> he should <S%H977>choose.<s%>
His <S%H5315>soul<s%> will <S%H3885>abide<s%> in <S%H9185>prosperity,<s%> And his <S%H2233>descendants<s%> will <S%H3423>inherit<s%> the <S%H776>land.<s%>
The <S%H5475>secret<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is for those who <S%H3372>fear<s%> Him, And He will make them <S%H3045>know<s%> His <S%H1285>covenant.<s%>
My <S%H5869>eyes<s%> are <S%H8548>continually<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> For He will <S%H3318>pluck<s%> my <S%H7272>feet<s%> out of the <S%H7568>net.<s%>
<S%H6437>Turn<s%> to me and be <S%H2603>gracious<s%> to me, For I am <S%H3173>lonely<s%> and <S%H6041>afflicted.<s%>
The <S%H6869>troubles<s%> of my <S%H3824>heart<s%> are <S%H7337>enlarged;<s%> <S%H3318>Bring<s%> me out of my <S%H4691>distresses.<s%>
<S%H7200>Look<s%> upon my <S%H6040>affliction<s%> and my <S%H5999>trouble,<s%> And <S%H5375>forgive<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H9128>sins.<s%>
<S%H7200>Look<s%> upon my <S%H340>enemies,<s%> for they are <S%H7231>many;<s%> And they <S%H8130>hate<s%> me with <S%H2555>violent<s%> <S%H8135>hatred.<s%>
<S%H8104>Guard<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> and <S%H5337>deliver<s%> me; Do not let me be <S%H954>ashamed,<s%> for I <S%H2620>take<s%> <S%H2620>refuge<s%> in Thee.
Let <S%H8537>integrity<s%> and <S%H3476>uprightness<s%> <S%H5341>preserve<s%> me, For I <S%H6960>wait<s%> for Thee.
<S%H6299>Redeem<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> O <S%H430>God,<s%> Out of <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H6869>troubles.<s%>
